abstract: Two Ebola vaccines being tested on more than 600 volunteers in Liberia pass initial safety tests.
lead_paragraph: Two experimental Ebola vaccines “appear to be safe” partway through a clinical trial being conducted in Liberia, the National Institutes of Health said Thursday.

headline.main: Ebola Vaccines Pass Initial Safety Tests
headline.print_headline: Science and Health; Ebola Vaccines Pass Initial Safety Tests

snippet: Two experimental Ebola vaccines “appear to be safe” partway through a clinical trial being conducted in Liberia, the National Institutes of Health said Thursday.
